title: VerdictSpace
description: A standardized template for defining a space of legal verdicts for use with the Semantic Holder primitive.

verdictSpaceId.description: Unique identifier for this verdict space (e.g., a URI).

issuingAuthority.description: The legal body or institution that defines this space.

jurisdiction.description: The legal jurisdiction this space applies to (e.g., 'EU', 'US-NY').

version.description: Version of this verdict space definition.

id.description: A unique machine-readable identifier for the verdict.

description.description: A human-readable description of the verdict.
